name: Darkness in the clouds - v1.1
description:
Game created for the Ludum Dare Game Jam #48. The Theme was "Deeper and deeper".  Everything except the Music was created by me.

Explore the dark side of the Cloudworld by following the guidance of your Ancestors. Can you stay strong?

This is not the original entry. It has some minor changes, but the overall expirience should be the same. Link to the original entry:
https://itch.io/game/edit/1015514

Controles:  WASD or Arrow Keys

Music: - SONRIE by Charles Michel 1994 - The end of the world by Dicotomica

Changes:
- improoved cloud boat docking
   - added indicator
   - increased collider
   - adjusted size and speed of arrow
- turned down volume
- camera now follows player instead of being attached
- added moving clouds to the background
- fixed some layer ordering issues where the player was on top of some sprites while flying
- improved movement
   - tweaked the player controler script as well as the rigidbody
   - added collision mask to the raycast for detecting the ground
   - added another raycast for jumping, so both bottom corners are now detecting if the player stays on the ground
- added the missing collision to the world border
- minor story script changes
- added a second end card, for when you stay in the darkness
